pros: Meaningful job and work on global issues
cons: Bureaucracy and lack of transferrable skills development

job_title: Senior Director of Communications in Moscow, Moskva
pros: Works to support civilians and humanitarian law in the world's most fascinating and intractable conflicts. Very committed staff. Interesting work. Offers unbeatable life experiences.
cons: Approach to staff is part military-style with strict and inflexible ruling. May make it less suitable for non-medical outsiders with non-ICRC experience. HR rules and treatment of staff can sometimes seem shambolic, arcane, and cruel, frankly.

pros: interesting work, good social package, terms of work and people
cons: not much opportunities for growth, especially in non-operational delegations
